trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Representa a classe base para todos os <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event to respond when the user clicks a ButtonBase.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>eventos responder quando o utilizador clica da ButtonBase.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The user can raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event by using an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode aumentar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>eventos utilizando uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>ou premindo ENTER ou a barra de espaço quando o controlo tem foco.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> to `true` and captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador premir a barra de espaço, os conjuntos de controlo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>para `true` e capture o rato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, o controlo irá gerar eventos de rato como <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> or capture the mouse, but it does raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>ou ENTER não altera <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>ou para capturar o rato, mas aumentar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonBase sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A> attached property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos da ButtonBase o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>ligado propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonBase sets the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos da ButtonBase o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A ButtonBase is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: É um ButtonBase um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, o que significa que pode conter um único objeto de qualquer tipo (como uma cadeia, uma imagem ou um painel).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The user can raise the Click event by using an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode gerar o evento de clique, utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>ou premindo ENTER ou a barra de espaço quando o controlo tem foco.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> to `true` and captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador premir a barra de espaço, os conjuntos de controlo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>para `true` e capture o rato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, o controlo irá gerar eventos de rato como <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> or capture the mouse, but it does raise the Click event.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>ou ENTER não altera <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>ou para capturar o rato, mas gere o evento de clique.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase> marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method and raises the Click event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>marcas o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>eventos como processadas o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>método e desencadeia o evento de clique.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: Hence, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> event will never occur for a control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>evento nunca ocorrerá de um controlo que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, ligar a um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>eventos ou chamada <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>com `handledEventsToo` definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Encaminhados informações sobre eventos ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Estratégia de encaminhamento | Bubbling | | Delegado | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> evento encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: This event corresponds to a left mouse button click.
trans-unit.target: Este evento corresponde a um clique do botão esquerdo do rato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: When the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o comando para invocar quando este botão é premido.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to associate a command with a particular button instance.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é utilizada para associar um comando com uma instância específica do botão.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], this property is most often set to be a static command value from one of the existing command libraries, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], esta propriedade é definida com mais frequência para ser um valor de comando estático de uma das bibliotecas de comando existente, tal como <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands>

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral do Commanding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *commandName* The command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *commandName* o comando para invocar quando este botão é premido.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A command to invoke when this button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Um comando para invocar quando este botão é premido.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o parâmetro para passar para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Most existing commands from the command libraries do not use a command parameter.
trans-unit.target: A maioria dos comandos existentes partir das bibliotecas de comando não utilizam um parâmetro de comando.

trans-unit.source: Of the commands that do use a command parameter, most of these take a parameter with some primitive type value, such as an integer or a string.
trans-unit.target: Comandos que utilizam um parâmetro de comando, a maioria destes demorar um parâmetro com um valor de tipo primitivo, tais como um número inteiro ou uma cadeia.

trans-unit.source: However, it is possible to create a custom command where that command expects a nonprimitive type as its command parameter.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, é possível criar um comando personalizado onde esse comando espera um tipo nonprimitive como o parâmetro de comando.

trans-unit.source: For a custom command case like this, setting CommandParameter in code might require a new or existing object instance.
trans-unit.target: Para um cenário de comando personalizados como esta, a definição CommandParameter no código poderão exigir uma instância de objeto novo ou existente.

trans-unit.source: Setting CommandParameter in markup might require property element syntax, where the object element filling the property element syntax is a new element of the type expected by that command.
trans-unit.target: Definição CommandParameter no markup pode requerer a sintaxe do elemento de propriedade, onde o elemento de objeto ao preencher a sintaxe do elemento de propriedade é um novo elemento do tipo esperado por esse comando.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, setting in markup might require a reference through a markup extension to an existing object (typically these references are made with [Binding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, a definição no markup poderão exigir uma referência através de uma extensão de markup para um objeto existente (normalmente, estas referências efetuadas com [enlace extensão de Markup](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) ou [extensão de Markup StaticResource](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *commandParameter* A value of the same type as the particular command specified in the property expects.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de atributos de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *commandParameter* do mesmo tipo com o comando específico especificado no valor de propriedade espera.

trans-unit.source: If you use an existing command library command, see that command library's documentation for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, including which type of CommandParameter the command expects.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar um comando de biblioteca existente do comando, consulte a documentação de nessa biblioteca de comandos para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informações de utilização, incluindo o tipo de CommandParameter espera que o comando.

trans-unit.source: If you use a custom command, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar comandos personalizados, consulte observações.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: Parameter to pass to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: Parâmetro para passar para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandParameter*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the routed <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o encaminhadas <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Command*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element on which to raise the specified command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o elemento no qual a emitir o comando especificado.

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property cannot be used to define a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CommandTarget não pode ser utilizada para definir um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property provides a reference to an element that is already defined somewhere in your application.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CommandTarget fornece uma referência a um elemento que já está definido num local na sua aplicação.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *elementName* The name of that receives the command.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *elementName* o nome do que recebe o comando.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: Element on which to raise a command.
trans-unit.target: Elemento no qual a emitir um comando.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.CommandTarget*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: If you choose to override this implementation, make certain that you call the base method.
trans-unit.target: Se optar por ignorar esta implementação, certifique-se de que tem de chamar o método base.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo está ativado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> is currently activated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"> </xref> atualmente está ativado.

trans-unit.source: IsPressed is the state of a button that indicates the left mouse button or SPACEBAR is pressed over the button.
trans-unit.target: IsPressed é o estado de um botão que indica o botão do rato esquerdo ou barra de espaço é premida através do botão.

trans-unit.source: When IsPressed is `true`, the control captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Quando é IsPressed `true`, o controlo captura o rato.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, o controlo irá gerar eventos de rato como <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseDirectlyOverChanged> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> or ENTER does not change IsPressed or capture the mouse, but is does raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>ou ENTER não alterar IsPressed de captura ou o rato, mas é gerado does o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsPressed has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: Iniciando com o .NET Framework versão 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsPressed tem um setter protegido.

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar esta funcionalidade, a aplicação deve visar o .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [versões e dependências](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"></xref> is activated; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase"> </xref> está ativada; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for this control is called.
trans-unit.target: Responde quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>para este controlo é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A> is `true`, this method calls the base implementation, which gives this control focus.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A>é `true`, este método chama a implementação base, o que lhe dá foco este controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs.IsMultiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> evento encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O controlo gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>evento chamando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral de eventos encaminhados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed*>

trans-unit.source: The data for <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> evento encaminhado que ocorre quando o utilizador prime uma chave enquanto este controlo tem foco.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> and one of the following cases are true: - The user presses the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>eventos como processada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados de eventos para `true` quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>não está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>e um dos seguintes casos forem verdadeiras:-o utilizador premir a barra de espaço.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: - The user presses ENTER and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A> is `true` for this control.
trans-unit.target: -O utilizador prime ENTER e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>é `true` para este controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardNavigation.AcceptsReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event data.
trans-unit.target: Noutros casos, esta implementação não altera o estado processado (o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade) da <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>dados de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user releases a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> evento encaminhado que ocorre quando o utilizador liberta uma tecla enquanto este controlo tem foco.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when the user releases the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>eventos como processada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados de eventos para `true` quando o utilizador liberta a barra de espaço.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event data.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, esta implementação não altera o estado processado (o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade) da <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>dados de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Called when an element loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um elemento perde o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement.LostKeyboardFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref> routed event that occurs when this control is no longer receiving mouse event messages.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"> </xref> evento encaminhado que ocorre quando este controlo já não está a receber mensagens de evento do rato.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> event data.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação não altera o estado processado (o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade) da <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture>dados de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*> routed event that occurs when the mouse enters this control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>evento encaminhado que ocorre quando o rato entra neste controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode*>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, this implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, marca esta implementação a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>eventos como processada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados de eventos para `true` e gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse leaves an element.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"> </xref> evento encaminhado que ocorre quando o rato deixa um elemento.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>eventos como processada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados de eventos para `true` quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> evento encaminhado que ocorre quando o botão esquerdo do rato é premido enquanto o ponteiro do rato está sobre este controlo.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>eventos como processada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados de eventos para `true` quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>não está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para responder ao <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>evento, anexe um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>eventos ou chamada <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>com `handledEventsToo` definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>, este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"> </xref> evento encaminhado que ocorre quando o botão esquerdo do rato é libertado enquanto o ponteiro do rato está sobre este controlo.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>eventos como processada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados de eventos para `true` quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>não está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para responder ao <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>evento, anexe um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp>eventos ou chamada <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>com `handledEventsToo` definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> is `true`, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>é `true`, este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse pointer moves while over this element.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref> evento encaminhado que ocorre quando o ponteiro do rato se move enquanto estiver sobre este elemento.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>eventos como processada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados de eventos para `true` quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A>não está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ClickMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.ClickMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para responder ao <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>evento, anexe um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove>eventos ou chamada <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>com `handledEventsToo` definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Called when the rendered size of a control changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o tamanho composto de um controlo é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the OnRenderSizeChanged method of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o método OnRenderSizeChanged <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size changes.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as alterações de tamanho.
